alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:58PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Graham and north central Cochise Counties through 645 PM MST... At 557 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Bowie, or 15 miles east of Willcox. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Willcox and Bowie. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 343 and 371. Route 186 between mile markers 327 and 351. Route 191 between mile markers 88 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
